description: Non-Material Amendments (s.96A) to planning permission P2015/5319/S73, dated 10/11/2016.  The proposal would vary condition 2 (approved plans) to reflect design changes to the foundations, party wall design, internal layouts, fenestration, roof maintenance access, top storey design, rooflights, and biodiverse roof.  Condition 3 (materials and samples) would also be varied to allow decorative metalwork (e.g. gates) to be approved prior to relevant works (rather than pre-superstructure)
decision_conditions:
Informative 1 (Part 1 of 3):
The following alternative wording of condition 2 to planning permission P2015/5319/S73 is agreed as a non-material amendment:
"DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS (Compliance)

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Existing Plans as approved by reference P2014/2950/FUL:
12018_(01)_010 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_100 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_101 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_102 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_103 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_104 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_105 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_201 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_202 Rev P1; 12018_(01)_203 Rev P1.

Demolition Plans as approved by reference P2014/2950/FUL:
12018_(12)_100 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_101 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_102 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_103 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_104 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_105 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_201 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_202 Rev P1; 12018_(12)_203 Rev P1.

The following documents approved by reference P2014/2950/FUL:
Design and Access Statement (AHMM, 21 July 2014); Transport Statement (TPP, July 2014); Noise Assessment (The EQUUS Partnership, Ref: EPL 4243); Archaeological Desk Based Assessment (CgMS , August 2014); Letter dated 10/09/2014 to GLAAS from CgMS (Ref: ARCH/MS/16519); Draft Green Performance Plan (Norman, Disney & Young, July 2014); Air Quality Assessment (ENVIRON, July 2014); Sustainable Design and Construction Statement (Norman, Disney & Young, July 2014) ; Daylight, Sunlight & Overshadowing Report (Delva Patman Redler, July 2014); Daylight Addendum Letter (Delva Patman Redler, Ref: SJP/sev/12185); Desk Based Ground Conditions Report (GEA, July 2014).

Proposed Plans as approved by reference P2015/5319/S73:
12018_(00)_017 Rev P4
